data.value:

data.name: textBox2.Text
data.value:
Bangladesh is a developing country. The economic risk point of Bangladesh is now 25.2 percent. If this point exceeds 36, one country has to be in the list of Least Developed Countries. But there are so many obstacles and problems to reach that point. Such as Rohingya issue, flood, flash flood, riverbank erosion, population problems, education problems, medical problems etc. To solve these problems, we need so much money and donation. Our government and many international and private organization are trying to resolve these problems with donation. But there are no proper organization or system to distribute that donation in proper way with trust. For example, one problem needs 10 million taka but got 30 million taka, on the other side another problem needs 50 million taka but got only 20 million taka. At this situation one got over donation and another got less donation. But for the absence of a proper system the first problem’s extra money got stolen by some corrupted people.
The root cause of this problem is corruptions. As Bangladesh is not a proper educated nation and has less proper knowledge in religion so that, most of the people break the rules just for his own benefits. This problem is so important to consider because donation is not for someone’s luxury satisfaction. It is for someone’s basic needs. It is a human right. Nobody has any permission to take someone’s basic rights.
